name: typescript-poor-man-reflection
description: An unconventional way of getting TypeScript code information (like types), as text, at runtime

scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120 --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.sample-project: cd sample-project && ([ -d node_modules ] || npm i]) && npm run all
scripts.docs: npx typedoc src/types.ts src/main.ts src/replaceFileFunctionCall.ts src/replaceProjectFunctionCall.ts --theme markdown --out api --ignoreCompilerErrors
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.all-all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build && npm run test-run-all && npm run docs
